physical_appearance: "The image shows three newspaper clippings that are pasted onto a light purple paper. There are several punched holes at its left side. ""Famous Soprano to sing here tonight""
title_text: Details about Joan Hammond before and after her concert in Singapore  Joan Hammond concert programme and related newspaper cuttings
subject_terms_1: ""Joan hammond recital was great and varied"" opera singers celebrities concerts recitals
subject_terms_2: and ""Joan Hammond in good voice"" are the respective headlines of the three newspaper clippings. The clipping on the right hand side contians a picture of a smiling Joan Hammond in a formal dress." Hammond, Joan, 1912 - 1996 Celebrities Concerts
